examples.example: 经过不懈的努力，他终于得到了自己梦寐以求的奖品。

translate.english: Through unremitting efforts, he finally got the prize he had been dreaming of.

examples.example: 通过自己的辛勤付出，他最终得到了应有的回报。

translate.english: Through his own hard work, he finally got the due reward.

examples.example: 通过自己的不断探索，他终于得到了宝贵的经验。

translate.english: Through his continuous exploration by himself, he finally got precious experience.
